basics.name: Thavishka Gamage
basics.label: Master of Engineering student in Industrial & Systems Engineering at the University of Cincinnati
basics.summary: Thavishka Gamage is at the University of Cincinnatiâ€™s College of Engineering and Applied Science (CEAS), where he is pursuing a Master of Engineering (MEng) in Industrial & Systems Engineering and previously earned a Bachelor of Science (B.S.) in Computer Science. Passionate about leveraging knowledge in science, technology, engineering, and mathematics, he thrives on creating innovative solutions and leading transformative projects. He has demonstrated his capabilities through a variety of research, co-op, and internship experiences, gaining hands-on expertise in software development, data analysis, and project management. Believing in continuous learning, he actively seeks growth opportunities through shadowing and volunteering. He is also passionate about startups, both in building his own ventures and contributing to early-stage companies that focus on innovation. With a strong foundation in both technical and financial domains, he is dedicated to making a significant impact in the technology and finance industries, guided by a clear vision for leadership and excellence.

work.summary: Head of online presence for Ka Leo
highlights: Maintain, update, and oversee official college newspaper website
Drive, design and build student-community projects for UH Manoa
Troubleshoot software, hardware and networking issues over the phone
Answer phone and email responses to the ITS Help Desk

volunteer.organization: Center for Renewable Energy and Island Sustainability
volunteer.summary: Lead developer for weather sensing project

Maintain custom data collection and storage infrastructure
Webmaster/IT Officer, IEEE Student Branch, UH Manoa, 2012-2013

awards.title: B+ Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students who complete a rigorous high school curriculum with a minimum overall GPA of 3.0 at a Hawai'i public school.

awards.title: First place
awards.summary: My team won first place in 2015.  See my portfolio site for more details.
